title: RPM Gauge font on old Ford Mustang
content:
A client says they need to match this font exactly. I didn't recognize it, then looked all through FontShop's latest big yellow book Sans section but couldn't match it. I suspect it was likely a privately commissioned typeface from Ford, but wanted to run it by the experts here to see if anyone could match it to a known available font before telling my client it would need to be hand-drawn. Or failing that, if anyone could suggest something very close, if it comes to that. Thanks.

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20100305101212im_/http:/typophile.com/files/RPM-Gauge-cropped_4877.jpg)
author: whitespace
